vulnerability.name: CVE-2025-45769
vulnerability.description: Vulnerability in firebase/php-jwt allowing certain JWT validation bypass

statements.impact_statement: This extension does not use firebase/php-jwt directly. The dependency is transitive via typo3/cms-core. This extension does not perform JWT validation, token parsing, or any cryptographic operations. The vulnerable code path is never executed by this extension. Remediation is pending upstream TYPO3 Core update.
